client_description.Summary Note:
Salo Järvinen Heikkinen and the RM crossed paths at a mutual friend's dinner party in Helsinki. They discovered they had many common acquaintances and decided to explore business opportunities together.
Salo Järvinen Heikkinen is a 28 year old Ship Broker from Finland.
He was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
client_description.Family Background: Salo Järvinen Heikkinen and Maarika tied the knot in 2025. They do not have any children.
client_description.Education Background:
Salo received his secondary school diploma from Hyvinkään Sveitsin lukio in 2016.
Salo pursued higher education at Centria University of Applied Sciences, graduating in 2021.
client_description.Occupation History:
Salo Järvinen Heikkinen is a 28 year old Ship Broker from Finland.
Salo Järvinen Heikkinen began his professional journey as a Ship Broker at Meriaura Oy in 2021, laying the foundation for future success.
client_description.Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 30000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
Client does not have any properties.He inherited a significant sum of 2340000 EUR from his grandfather, a respected Real Estate Developer, in 2016, which he has wisely invested.
client_description.Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
